Heh... Such anger.It seems this thing is truly special to the
fools of this village.

column3:
そんな大きな声を出さなくても
私は ここにいますよ
column4: You don't have to shout. I'm right here.

column3:
おやおや その言葉は心外ですね～先に組織を抜けたいと言ったのは
ドゥラン… アナタではないですか？
組織を抜けるということが どういうことか…
アナタが一番 ご存じなはずでは？
column4:
Don't play dumb, Dorian.You knew what you were getting yourself
into when you decided to leave the
organization.
You forfeited your life the moment you
left.

column3:
しかし…
アナタは最後に いい仕事をしてくれました
column4:
You did well to tell us about
the heirloom.

column3:
アナタの始末は後回しです
…まずは
column4:
Unfortunately, your usefulness has come
to an end, as must you. But first...

column3:
そちらに隠れている剣士様の
お命からいただくとしましょう！
column4: It appears we have an audience!

column3:
そちらに隠れている剣士様の
お命からいただくとしましょうか…
我が主の恨みも…
しっかり晴らさせていただきますよ
column4:
It appears we have an audience!


FOR MY FALLEN MASTER!

column3: とんでもないことに…
column4: This is awful...

column3:
リンク様…ちょっと目を離した隙に…パーヤは…
パーヤは どうすれば…
column4:
Link...I swear I only took my eyes off it for a
second!What should I...
What should I do?

column3:
宝珠が…宝珠が盗まれてしまったのです…やっと… やっと あの宝珠の謎が
わかったところ でしたのに…
column4:
The Sheikah heirloom...The heirloom has been stolen!And just when I had finally discovered
the heirloom's secret...

column3:
元気なんかでるわけが
ないじゃないですか！
宝珠が…宝珠が盗まれてしまったのです…やっと… やっと あの宝珠の謎が
わかったところ でしたのに…
column4:
Keep my chin up?
Do you even realize how bad this is?!

The Shiekah heirloom...The heirloom has been stolen!And just when I had finally discovered
the heirloom's secret.

column3:
『この宝珠に認められし者
古の加護をうけん』パーヤはのう…
この宝珠に認められし者とは其方のことだと
寝る間も惜しんで
宝珠の謎を調べておったのだ
そして古の加護とは村の高台にあるような
古代の祠のことであり…
そしてまた あの宝珠は
祠を開く鍵であることをつきとめ
それらを其方に伝えるべく
待っていた矢先に…このようなことに…
column4:
\"The hero, as chosen by the Sheikah
heirloom, will be gifted the blessing
of antiquity.\"Paya thinks \"The hero, as chosen by the
Sheikah heirloom\" is you, so she stayed
up all night researching the heirloom.
She came to the conclusion that
\"the blessing of antiquity\" refers to
one of those ancient shrines.
And that the heirloom is the key that
opens the shrine.

And just before we were able to tell
you this, the thing is stolen!

column3:
パーヤは朝から夕刻まで
毎日宝珠を磨いておりました…
闇夜に乗じて何者かが忍びこんだことは
間違いないのですが…
ここは部外者は入れぬ場所…この村に… そのようなことをする者は
おらぬと信じてはおりますが…
column4:
I had been cleaning the heirloom
regularly every day from morning
to dusk.
Someone must have stolen it during 
the deepest hour of the night.

This place is off-limits to outsiders...And no one from the village would do
such a thing! Would they?

column3:
パーヤは毎日宝珠を磨いておりました
盗人は闇夜に乗じ忍び込んだに違いありません…
ドゥランやボガードにも確認いたしましたが
村人以外は見かけていないと…
しかし… この村にそのようなことをする者が
いるとは思えませんし…
それよりも宝珠がなくなって
まだ間ものうございます
盗人は まだ近くに潜んでいるかもしれませぬ夜に怪しい動きをする者を見つけられても
決して近づかれませぬよう…
column4:
I clean the heirloom during the day,
so the thief must have snuck in
at night.
I checked with Dorian and Cado, but
they've only seen other villagers around.

And I can't think that anyone in this
village would do something like this.

Since the heirloom was stolen recently,
the thief could still be hiding nearby.Just to be safe—if you see someone
acting suspiciously at night,
don't approach them.

column3:
悪意を持った者が この神聖な場に…
祖母が無事であったのは何よりですが
パーヤは…
パーヤは恐ろしゅうございます…
column4:
Someone with evil intent came into this
sacred place.

I'm glad Grandmother is safe, but I still
feel so...violated.

column3:
リンクよ… パーヤはすっかりおびえておる
賊もまだ近くにいるやもしれん…
しばらくは パーヤの側にいてくれぬか…
column4:
Link... Paya is afraid that the thief may
still be nearby. Would you please stay by
her side today?

column3:
…リンク様…
ありがとうございました
リンク様が一日中側にいてくださったおかげで
私も盗人に立ち向う勇気が湧いてまいりました
泣いてばかりは いられませんね…

ドゥランやボガードにも確認いたしましたが
村人以外は見かけていないと…
私も宝珠が盗まれた あの夜のことを
もう一度思い出してみようと思いますが
盗人は まだ近くに潜んでいるかもしれません夜に怪しい動きをする者を見つけられても
決して近づかれませぬよう…
column4:
Master Link...


Thank you for staying by my side for the
whole day.

I see now that crying and feeling scared
won't help us get the heirloom back.

I checked with Dorian and Cado, but they
said they didn't see anyone other than
villagers around.
I'll try again to remember all I can about
the night the heirloom was stolen,
but the thief may still be hiding nearby.I have a bad feeling. If you spot any
suspicious movement at night, don't
approach...

column3:
お前さんも
あの城を見に来たのかのぅ？あの光…
邪悪なものだとわかっているんじゃが…
夜になると浮かび上がる姿が美しくてのぅ
時折 ここに見に来るんじゃ
…こんなこと ばあさんや村の者には
口が裂けても言えんがな
column4:
Have you come to look at the castle too?I know the light swirling around the
castle is the manifestation of pure evil
and all, but it's kind of beautiful.
I sometimes come up here at night to
look at it, but I could never tell my old
lady or the village about it.

column3:
お前さんも
あの城を見に来たのかのぅ？あの光…
邪悪なものだとわかっているんじゃが…
夜になると浮かび上がる姿が美しくてのぅ
時折 ここに見に来るんじゃ
しかし…
今夜はよく人を見かけるのぅ…
さっきもドゥランが奥の裏山の方に
走っていきよったしのぅ…
なんだか急いでおったでのぅ
声はかけなんだが…
column4:
Have you come to look at the castle too?I know the light swirling around the
castle is the manifestation of pure evil
and all, but it's kind of beautiful.
Although I'm surprised to see so many
people up here tonight. I just saw Dorian
run off to the hills back there.
He seemed like he was in a hurry, so 
I didn't get a chance to speak with him.

column3:
今日は気分がいいでのぅ

ちょっと散歩してから
帰るとするかのぅ
column4:
What a nice day today was.


I think I'll go for a little walk, and then
head home.

column3: ほほぅ…
column4: Humm da dumm...

column3:
いるんだろ！
隠れてないで出てこい！
column4:
I know you're there!
Show yourself!

column3: 宝珠を盗んだのは お前だな！
column4:
So you're the ones who stole
the heirloom!

column3: なぜ盗んだりなど…
column4: Why would you steal it?

column3: くっ…
column4: Hnng...

column3:
まさか後をつけられていたとは…

お気づきだと思いますが…
今回のことは すべて私が招いたことなのです…
column4:
I can't believe I was being followed.


I'm sure you've figured it out, but all of
this is my fault...

column3:
しかし私は再度決意をしたのです
アイツらと縁を切ることを！
子供たちだけなら私の手で守れる…
そう考えたのです
…しかし アイツらは卑怯にも
インパ様やパーヤ様にまで魔の手を…
column4:
But my grief over losing my wife
consumed me, and I finally decided to
cut ties with the Yiga completely!
I decided I could protect my children
from the Yiga. I wasn't afraid of them.

But the Yiga are pure evil. They told
me they would kill both Impa and Paya if
I didn't play along!

column3:
ご存知かと思いますが この宝珠は
古の祠を開く鍵だと分かりました
私たちには扱うことができませんでしたが
貴方様ならきっと…
column4:
Paya figured out that this heirloom is the
key to opening an ancient shrine.

We weren't able to make it work,
but Paya thinks that maybe you can.

column3:
勝手な お願いだとは分かっておりますが
今回のことは秘密にしていただけませんか？
子供達に… ココナとプリコに
これ以上 つらい思いは させたくないのです
償えるものではないと分かっておりますが
これからは命をかけて護るつもりです
村も家族も…
column4:
I'm very sorry for all of this.


I know it's a selfish request, but do you
think you could keep what really
happened a secret?
I truly don't deserve mercy, but I don't
want my children, Koko and Cottla, to
suffer anymore.
I know it doesn't make up for what I've 
done, but I pledge to protect the village
and my family from now on.
No matter the cost.

column3:
隠していても仕方がありません…

実は…

私は イーガ団の人間なのです…

しかし妻と出会い子に恵まれ
私は考えを改め…
そしてイーガ団から足を洗おうとしました

しかし そのことで… 
妻は命を奪われてしまったのです…
column4:
There's no point in trying to hide it.


I am...a member of the Yiga Clan.
Or I used to be, anyway.

But then I met the most incredible
woman who blessed me with two
amazing children.
And so I tried to change my ways.
Tried to leave the clan.

But the Yiga... They took my wife's life
as punishment.

column3:
手ごわいですが敵は一人です！
ここで奴を倒しましょう！
column4:
It won't be an easy fight, but he's just
one man. To arms!

column3:
私は これ以上家族に魔の手が及ばないよう
門番という立場を利用し
アイツらに この村の…
貴方の情報を流していたのです
column4:
I couldn't let them hurt my children, so I
used my position as gatekeeper to
gather information for the Yiga.
I told them about you and about the
village in exchange for safety.

column3:
貴方様の お役に立てることが
パーヤ様の…"皆の願いです
column4:
Paya...and all of us are devoted to
helping you in your quest.

column3: さぁ宝珠を台座に お納めください

Go ahead and place the heirloom
on its pedestal.

column3:
このままだと奴は村の者に何をするか…
ここで決着をつけましょう！
column4:
If we let him go, there's no telling what
he might do! Let's finish this!

リンク殿 どちらへ？
さあ宝珠をお納めください

Where are you going, Master Link?
I thought you were going to return

Now, please restore this heirloom

やはりその宝珠は祠を開くカギだったのですね
よかった…
リンク様 その…
column4:
So the heirloom WAS the key to opening

Master Link, I...

しかし一体誰が宝珠を…この屋敷に出入りしていた者は おりましたが

怪しい者など誰一人通りませんでした
column4:
But who could have stolen the heirloom?There were some people visiting
the manor, but they were all
known villagers.
I don't remember seeing anyone
suspicious.

ぬおっ！ これはこれはリンク殿
こ… このような時間にどうされましたか？
column4:
Whoa! Well if it isn't Master Link.
What are you doing wandering around
in the dead of night?

column3:
私ですか？
ああ…まあ…"私はですね… 
村の…

そう！"村の見回りをしているのです！
賊がまだ村に潜んでいるやもしれませんのでな！
しかし… ボガード1人にお屋敷の警護を
任せるのも気がかりですし
やはり戻るとしようかな…
…では失礼
column4:
Me? Um...
I was just...

The village...


Yes! I was patrolling the village!
The thief could be hiding anywhere,
you know!
But I should probably get back to my
post. Leaving Cado alone on guard duty
is dangerous.
Stay safe out here.

column3:
こ… こんな時間に怪しい動きをしていると
犯人に間違われてしまいますよ
リ… リンク殿も お気を付け下さい
column4:
You should really stop stalking about at
night like this, or someone may mistake
you for the thief.
P-please do be careful, Master Link.

column3:
むおっ！ リンク殿？！

こ… このような場所で会うとは
奇遇ですなぁ！
column4:
Whoa! Master Link?


I...uh, didn't expect to run into you
here!

column3:
し… しかし こんな時間に
こんな所にいらっしゃるなんて
不審者と間違われてしまいますよ
ははは…
column4:
You know, stalking about at night around
here makes you look pretty suspicious.
Someone may mistake you for the thief!
Hahaha!

column3:
私… ですか？

私は…夜の…

そう！"夜の散歩をしているのです！

しかし…少し遠くまで
来すぎてしまったようです
そろそろ戻るとしようかな…
…では失礼
column4:
What am I doing?


I was...just...walking.


Yes! I was taking a walk at night!


But it seems I've walked a bit too far.
Excuse me. I'm going to head back.

column3: これはこれは リンク殿…
column4: Well, if it isn't Master Link...

column4: I must do something.

column3: やはり戻るか…
column4: I should turn back...

column3: 誰も… おらんな
column4: Sure is quiet out here...

column3: む？今何か…？

column3: 気のせいか…
column4: Must be imagining things.

column3: どこだ！出てこい！
column4: Show yourself!

column3: 何てことだ…
column4: I can't believe this.

column3: 誰がこんなことを…
column4: Who did this?

column3:
いくら年上が好きと言っても
私は人妻… あきらめるんじゃな
column4:
I can tell you're into older women, but
I'm married. Give it up.

column3:
まだおるのか…こんな夜更けまで ばあさんをつけまわして…
もしやお前さん…
不良か？まあ不良でも なんでもいいわい
さっさと遠くに行ってくれんかの…
グズグズしてると
夜が明けてしまうでの…
column4:
So you're still here...There's only one reason to follow around
an old woman in the wee hours of the
night...
HELP! I'M BEING ROBBED!Or maybe you're just bored. Either way,
I'm sick of looking at your mug.

The sun will be up before I know it.
Must hurry...

column3:
だ誰じゃ！まったく… こんなか弱い老人を

もしや…年上好きか？年上好きはいいことじゃが…私は人妻
そこは踏み込んではならんぞ！
column4:
Who's there?!Hmph... Following a weak, old woman
around like some kind of creepy
delinquent!
Are you into older women or something?Well, there's nothing wrong with that...
but I'm married to a fightin' man, I'll have
you know!

column3: おや私に何か用かね？
column4: What is it you want?

column3: グホッ！
column4: Grah!

column3:
夜じゃと！まさか見られた…
いや…"アレは誰にも知られてないはずじゃ
な…何のことかの…
夜はグッスリ眠るだけじゃわい
column4:
At night?So he knows...
I didn't think anyone had seen me.

Nighttime, huh? WelI, I sleep at night.
In my house. On a bed. That's about it.

column3:
ほっほ…急に話しかけられたもんで
ビックリしましたわい
まさかコヤツ…私の秘密を…
いや…"アレは誰にも知られてないはずじゃ
column4:
Heh... You sure gave me a fright talking

Could it be...he knows?
No... Nobody knows about that.

column3: まさか…見られてしまうとはのぅ…

column3:
インパ様のお屋敷に飾られとる
アレかのぅ？
column4:
You mean that garish thing in Impa's
house?

column3: ゴホッ ゴホッ！！

column3:

You caught me...I simply can't get enough of the

column3: ゴホッ ゴホッ！！

column3:
ここでのことは
じいさんに内緒で頼んだよ
column4:
I'm counting on you not to tell my old
man about this.

column3:
実は私は大のニンジン好きなんじゃ…
だが ウチのじいさんは大嫌いでのぅ…
だからこうやって時々こっそり
ニンジンを食べとるんじゃよ…
じいさんには内緒にしといとくれよ
column4:
Yes, I'm a big fan of carrots. But my
old man hates them.

So sometimes I sneak out at night to
get my fill.

Please don't tell my husband!

column3:
これ以上の食材は ないというのに…でも あの二人を見ていたら
ニンジンが好きなど口が裂けても言えんわい…
column4:
There is no greater food.But seeing how those two are acting, I'm
not about to admit to having a love affair
with carrots.

column3:
年寄りに対して なんちゅーことを…

私の大切な梅園は そもそもインパ様が
贈って下さったもの あれは宝じゃ！
インパ様には返す恩はあっても
仇はないわい！
ったく最近の若いもんは…

Is that any way to talk to an old woman?
I almost choked on my carrot!

Impa GAVE me the plum-tree orchard!
And yes, the orchard may be an heirloom
of this village, but it's technically mine!
You young people...

column3:

ったく最近の若いもんは…

よ夜じゃと？！だ… だから

毎日元気に営業中！
呉服屋忍杏亭はこちらです！

We're open every day!

ほんっと… ついてこないでよね！
column4:
Is someone... Is someone stalking me right now?!If you're following me, Jarod...
I told you it's over between us!

So stop following me!

column3: のわっ！
column4: AHHHH!

column3:
あーあ… さすがにもう隠しきれないかな…クラリにも内緒だったのに…ここはね…昔好きだった彼が

もう ずいぶん前の話だけどね…時々 こうやって会いにきてるんだ…
column4:
I guess I can't keep it a secret any
longer.Not even Claree knows...This is...where the love of my life sleeps.
No other guy has been able to stack up.He passed a long time ago, but I come
here every now and then to be with him.

column3: ホウジュ？ああ インパ様のお屋敷に飾られてる アレ？
column4: Heirloom?You mean that thing in Impa's house?

column3: サイテー…
column4: How awful of you...

column3:
はぁ？なんで私があんなのを
盗まないといけないのよ！
まさか…それで私を疑って
ついてきたの…？
column4:
What?!Why would I steal something like that?


Are you... Are you following me because
you think I'm a suspect?!

column3: ここは…昔好きだった彼が眠っている場所…魔物に襲われちゃって あっさり…ずっと…"守ってくれるって…"約束したのに…
column4:
This is...where the love of my life sleeps.He got attacked by a monster and...He promised...he would always...
protect me...

column3:
はっ？
まだそんな事言ってるわけ？
ちょっとは空気読みなさいよ！
目の前で可愛い女子が泣いてんでしょうが！！！
宝珠なんて興味ないし！そもそもドゥランさん達がいるのに
どうやって盗めっていうのよ！
か弱い女子に そんなこと
できるわけないでしょ！
column4:
Are you kidding me?


I'm pouring my heart out, and you're
going on about that stupid heirloom?!Besides, how could I steal it when
Dorian and the others are guarding
it all the time?
There's no way I could do that without
them noticing!

column3:
はっ？アンタ！ ちょっとは空気読みなさいよ！
目の前で可愛い女子が泣いてんでしょうが！！！
優しい言葉とかないわけ？別にアンタなんかに
優しくされなくても いいけどさ！
column4:
Thanks, I guess.But next time, try to be a little more
sensitive to people you don't know.Everyone has their own issues to deal
with.

column3: そろそろカナ…
column4: Any minute now...

column3: バレてない… よね
column4: Nobody knows...

column3: 誰も気づいてないよね
column4: I wonder if anyone knows.

column3: ふぅ…
column4: Phew...

column3:
まったくもう！
なんなのよ！！
お店に戻るだけなんだから
ついてこないでよ！
column4:
WHAT?!
What do you want?

I'm just on my way to the shop!
Stop following me!

column3:
まったくもう！
なんなのよ！！！
あ…やっぱり ストーカー？ラズリに変なことしたら
ドゥランさん達に言いつけるからね！
column4:
WHAT?!
What do you want?

Are you...Are you some kind of stalker?!Get out of here before I call for Dorian!

column3:
な… なになに？

こんな時間に女子に声かけるなんて

もしかしてこれがストーカーってやつ…？
アソコ行くのは後にしようかな…
よ…夜の一人歩きは危険だし…
やっぱり店にもどろうかな…
column4:
What?!


Why are you even talking to me at this
hour?

Is this guy some kind of stalker? He's a stalker!
I'm being stalked! So this is what it's like...
I guess I'll have to visit him later.
It... It sure is dangerous to be out alone
at night, huh? Maybe I'll just...head back
to the shop.

column3:
ごめん今あんまりしゃべる気分じゃないんだ…
ちょっと ソっとしといてもらえる？
column4: I need to be alone for a while...

column3:
…リンク殿私共が ついておりながら…
大変なことになってしまいました…
まさかこの屋敷に
賊が侵入するなど…
column4:
Link.We were standing guard the whole time,
and yet this awful thing still happened.

How could we have let someone sneak
right past us?

column3:
屋敷に何者かが侵入し
パーヤ様の大切な物を…
column4:
Someone snuck in and stole Lady Paya's
most prized possession...

column3:
昨日 この屋敷に出入りした者は…服屋のラズリと
梅園のメロばあさんぐらいですかね
他には怪しい者は見ておりません
column4:
The only people who came by yesterday
were...Lasli from the clothing shop and
Grandma Mellie from the plum garden.
That's about it.
I didn't see anyone else.

column3:
まだ盗人は近くにいるかもしれません
リンク殿もお気を付け下さい
column4:
The thief may still be nearby.


Please take care of yourself, Master Link.

column3:
おのれ～盗人め！毎日ドゥランと見張っておるというのに
一体どうやって…
村人以外 この屋敷に近づく事さえできぬはず…
column4:
That filthy thief!Me and Dorian were standing guard the
entire time! How did they get past us?!

The only people we let through were
known villagers...

column3:
まったく こんな大変な時だっていうのに
ドゥランは どこに行ってるんだか…
もしかしたら
高台の辺りまで見回りに行ってくれてるのかな
column4:
Why isn't Dorian back yet?


He said he was going to the area above
the village, but he should've been back
by now.

column3:
ええ村人なら誰でも出入りできますので…先日屋敷に訪れたのは…
ラズリちゃんとメロさんだけですよ
いつもは昼間に来るんですが
そういえば最近夜に来ることが多いなぁ…
まあ二人とも昼間は忙しいでしょうから
夜に のんびりしたいんでしょうな
column4:
Yes, known villagers are free to come and
go as they please.I think the only people that stopped by
around the time the heirloom went
missing were Lasli and Mellie.
They used to come around noonish,
but lately they've been stopping by
at night.
They must be too busy to stop by
during the day.

column3:
しばらくは我らも厳戒態勢
夜もドゥランと二人で見張っておりますので
村は安全ではありますが
リンク殿も夜は気を抜かれませぬよう…
column4:
We're on high alert for the time being.
Dorian and I will be on guard around
the clock.
The village should be safe, but please do
be careful at night, Master Link...

column3:
あのさー…

いきなり夜の事聞くなんて
レディーに失礼じゃない？
そんなの教えるわけないでしょ！
column4:
Excuse me?


It's none of your business what I do at
night!

Maybe think about finding a new pick-up
line.

column3:
用もないのに話しかけるなんて……お兄さん もしかしてラズリを…好きになっちゃった？やだっ お兄さん好みだけど…
ラズリは みんなのラズリなんだ！ ごめんね～
column4:
So you thought you'd just chat me up
out of the blue?Are you...Are you hitting on me?Look, you're a good-looking guy and all,
but I just got out of a toxic relationship.
Sorry!

column3:
リンク殿のお姿をみれば
パーヤ様も少しは落ち着かれることでしょう…
column4:
I'm sure Lady Paya would feel a little
more at ease if she saw Master Link's
face.
